oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - A John Cowan Christmas - 2009-12-05
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by John Cowan and his band. From the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on December 5, 2009
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: John Cowan
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Performances include: I Wish It Could Be Christmas Every Day; What Child Is This; The Christmas Song; East Meets West; Little Match Girl; O Holy Night; Christmas Time's A'Coming; God Rest Ye Merry Gentlemen; Carry On; I'll Be Home For Christmas; Let's Make A Baby King; Ava Maria; Go Tell It On The Mountain;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Cowan, John, 1952-; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
